% MathMode: plain, MathRender: svg, MathDpi: 300, MathEmbedLimit: 524288, MathScale: 105, MathBaseline: 0, MathDocClass: [10pt]book, MathImgDir: math, MathLatex: latex, MathSvgFontFormat: "", MathSvgSharePaths: True, MathSvgPrecision: 3, Dvisvg: dvisvgm

      \def\newtheorem{\@ifstar\newtheoremx\newtheoremx}
      \makeatother
      \providecommand{\newtheoremx}[3][]{}{}
    \fi

\begin{document}


\begin{mdSnippets}
%mdk-begin-mathdefs
%mdk-data-line={12;drwMacro.sty:1}
%% frequent fractions
\newcommand{\sele}{\frac{1}{16}}
\newcommand{\quat}{\frac{1}{4}}
\newcommand{\octo}{\frac{1}{8}}

%% Parenthese
\newcommand{\paren}[1]{\left( {#1} \right)}
\newcommand{\braces}[1]{\left \{ #1 \right \}}
\newcommand{\curly}[1]{\left \{ #1 \right \}}
\newcommand{\sqbra}[1]{\left[ #1 \right]}

%% Braket notation
\newcommand{\ket}[1]{\left\vert \! \! \ \left. #1 \right\rangle \right.}
\newcommand{\bra}[1]{\left. \left \langle {#1} \right. \right |}
\newcommand{\bracket}[1]{\left\langle #1 \right\rangle}
\newcommand{\braket}[2]{\bracket{ #1 | #2 }}
\newcommand{\ketbra}[2]{\ket{#1}\!\!\!\bra{#2}}

\newcommand{\kket}[1]{\left.\ket{#1} \!\! \right\rangle}
\newcommand{\bbra}[1]{\left\langle \! \right. \!\! \bra{#1}}

%round Braket
\newcommand{\roundbra}[1]{( #1 |}
\newcommand{\roundket}[1]{| #1 )}
\newcommand{\rbraket}[2]{\left ( #1 | #2 \right )}
\newcommand{\rketbra}[2]{| #1  )  ( #2 |}

\newcommand{\pair}[1]{\bracket{#1}} %% alias
%% Matrix (or linear algebra) related
\newcommand{\tr}{\mbox{tr}\ }
\newcommand{\Matrix}[1]{\paren{\begin{matrix} #1 \end{matrix}}}
\newcommand{\antiComm}[2]{\braces{#1,#2}} %% antiCom -> antiComm
\newcommand{\anticomm}[2]{\braces{#1,#2}} %% (lower case ver)
\newcommand{\comm}[2]{\sqbra{{#1},{#2}}}
\newcommand{\Liebra}[2]{\sqbra{#1,#2}}
\newcommand{\liebra}[2]{\sqbra{#1,#2}} %% synnnonym of \Liebra


\newcommand{\innerprod}[2]{\left\langle {#1}, {#2} \right\rangle}
\newcommand{\base}[1]{e_{#1}}

\newcommand{\dual}[1]{{#1}^{*}}

\newcommand{\eendo}[1]{\text{End}(#1)}

\newcommand{\idmat}{I}
%% Superalgebra
\newcommand{\parityfactor}[2]{(-1)^{\abs{#1}\abs{#2}}}
\newcommand{\grcomm}[2]{\comm{#1}{#2}} %% the same for comm at this moment.

%% Insert texts in equation environments
\newcommand{\mathComment}[1]{\mbox{#1}}  %% not fully implemented
\newcommand{\property}[1]{(\mathComment{#1}) \ \ \ }
\newcommand{\mathif}{\mbox{if \ }}
\newcommand{\conditional}[1]{\ \ (#1)}
\newcommand{\techterm}[1]{\textit{#1}}
\newcommand{\tech}[1]{\techterm{#1}} %% alias for \techterm
\newcommand{\reason}[1]{\qquad\paren{\because #1}}

%% Bourbaki
%%%% require 'amssymb' package for '\mathbb'
%\usepackage{amssymb}
\newcommand{\naturals}{\mathbb{N}} 
\newcommand{\integers}{\mathbb{Z}}
\newcommand{\rationals}{\mathbb{Q}}
\newcommand{\reals}{\mathbb{R}}
\newcommand{\complex}{\mathbb{C}}
\newcommand{\quaternions}{\mathbb{H}}
\newcommand{\field}{\mathbb{K}}
\newcommand{\grassmanns}{\mathcal{G}}
%% Linear Algebra, QM
\newcommand{\hilbert}[1]{\mathcal{H}_{#1}}

\newcommand{\tensor}{\otimes}
\newcommand{\directsum}{\bigoplus}
\newcommand{\dsum}{\oplus} %% synnonym
\newcommand{\Tr}{\mbox{Tr}}
\newcommand{\adjoint}{^{*}}
\newcommand{\transpose}{^T}
\newcommand{\trans}[1]{\mbox{}^t{#1}}
\newcommand{\supertranspose}{^T}

%\newcommand{\abs}[1]{\left| {#1} \right|}
\newcommand{\norm}[1]{\left | \left | {#1} \right | \right |}

\newcommand{\inverse}{^{-1}}
\newcommand{\inversep}[1]{\paren{#1}^{-1}}

\newcommand{\spectrum}[1]{\mbox{EV}\paren{#1}} %% qit notations
\newcommand{\majorised}{\prec} %% qit notations
\newcommand{\majorises}{\succ} %% qit notaions

\newcommand{\rank}[1]{\text{rank}\ {#1}}
\newcommand{\spanv}[1]{\text{span}\curly{#1}}


%% Lie Group and algebra
\newcommand{\liealg}[1][g]{\mathfrak{#1}}
\newcommand{\generator}[1][a]{T^{#1}}
\newcommand{\adj}{\text{ad}}
\newcommand{\ad}{\text{ad}}

\newcommand{\killing}[2]{\left \langle {#1} , {#2} \right \rangle}

\newcommand{\killingwedge}[2]{\left \langle {#1} \wedge {#2} \right \rangle}
\newcommand{\liewedge}[2]{\sqbra{#1 \wedge #2}}
\newcommand{\liebrawedge}[2]{\left [ {#1} \wedge {#2} \right ]} % synnonym

\newcommand{\osp}{\mathfrak{osp}}
\newcommand{\gl}{\mathfrak{gl}}

%% Probability Theory
\newcommand{\prob}[1]{\mbox{Prob}\paren{#1}}
\newcommand{\given}{\vert}

%% QIT
\newcommand{\minEntropy}[1]{H_{\small\mbox{min}}\sqbra{#1}}
\newcommand{\maxEntropy}[1]{H_{\small\text{max}}\sqbra{#1}}

%% QFT
\newcommand{\jfive}[1]{j^{#1 5}}
\newcommand{\vecpo}[1]{A_{#1}}
%%% differentiation
\newcommand{\diff}[2]{\frac{d {#1}}{d {#2}}}
\newcommand{\ddiff}[2]{\frac{d^2 {#1}}{d {#2}^2}}

\newcommand{\pardiff}[2]{\frac{\partial #1}{\partial #2}}
\newcommand{\parddiff}[2]{\frac{\partial^2 #1}{\partial {#2}^2}}

\newcommand{\lpardiff}[1][ ]{\frac{\overleftarrow{\partial}}{\partial {#1}} }
\newcommand{\rpardiff}[1][ ]{\frac{\overrightarrow{\partial}}{\partial {#1}} }

\newcommand{\Laplacian}{\mathop{}\!\mathbin\bigtriangleup}

\newcommand{\delco}[1]{\partial_{#1}} % del "COvariant"
\newcommand{\delcon}[1]{\partial^{#1}} % del "CONtravariant
\newcommand{\dell}[1][\mbox{}]{\partial_{#1}} % partial with index
\newcommand{\rdell}[1][]{\overrightarrow{\dell[#1]}}
\newcommand{\ldell}[1][]{\overleftarrow{\dell[#1]}}

%% p-adics
\newcommand{\padics}[1][p]{\mathbb{Q}_{#1}}

%% misc
\newcommand{\english}[1]{\textit{#1}}

\newcommand{\moduli}[1]{\left| {#1} \right|}

\newcommand{\Order}[1]{O\paren{#1}}

\newcommand{\half}{\frac{1}{2}}

\newcommand{\unitv}[1]{\bm{e}_{#1}}
\newcommand{\ex}[1]{e^{#1}}

\newcommand{\sq}[1]{\paren{#1}^2}
\newcommand{\sqmod}[1]{\sq{\moduli{#1}}}
\newcommand{\sqmodnp}[1]{\moduli{#1}^2}

\newcommand{\poisson}[2]{\curly{#1,#2}}

\newcommand{\suchthat}{\text{ s.t. }}

\newcommand{\ulink}[2]{\hyperref[#1]{\underline{#2}}}

\newcommand{\defarrow}{\overset{\mathrm{def}}{\Leftrightarrow}}

\newcommand{\equivalent}{\Leftrightarrow}

\newcommand{\parity}[1]{\abs{#1}}

%% can only be done in preamble
%%\DeclareMathOperator{\sign}{sign}

%% Category
\newcommand{\Hom}[2]{\mbox{Hom} \paren{{#1}, {#2}}}
\newcommand{\unity}[1]{\mathbb{1}_{#1}}%physics
\newcommand{\identity}[1][\mbox{}]{\mbox{id}_{#1}}

\newcommand{\isomorphic}{\simeq}
\newcommand{\uexists}{\exists \text{!}}
\newcommand{\pr}[1]{\text{pr}_{#1}}
\newcommand{\unit}{\mathbb{1}}
%% Quaternion
%% quaternionic units
\newcommand{\I}{i\, } % with a bit of space
\newcommand{\J}{j\, }
\newcommand{\K}{k\, }
%% Set
\newcommand{\cartesian}{\times}

%% differential geometry
\newcommand{\extd}{d}
\newcommand{\hodgestar}{*}
%% differential form
\newcommand{\forms}[1][\mbox{}]{\Lambda^*_{#1}}
\newcommand{\oddforms}{\Lambda^*_{1}}
\newcommand{\evenforms}{\Lambda^*_{0}}
\newcommand{\dx}[1][\mu]{dx^{#1}}
%%
\newcommand{\moyal}{*}

%% twistor notation
\newcommand{\twistor}[1][\mbox{}]{y_{#1}}
\newcommand{\Twistor}[1][\mbox{}]{y^{#1}} %% upper index
\renewcommand{\twistor}[1][]{\hat{y}_{#1}}
\renewcommand{\Twistor}[1][]{\hat{y}^{#1}}

%% "star" product notation
%\renewcommand{\star}{\bigast}
%\newcommand{\star}{\mathbin{\ooalign{$\hidewidth\bigast\hidewidth$\cr$\phantom{+}$}}}
%% order evaluation
\newcommand{\ttento}[1]{\times 10^{#1}}
\newcommand{\tento}[1]{10^{#1}}

\newcommand{\astar}{*}

$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={64}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={66}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={66}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[11134ff62a3534476fc6cc89687d67bf]%mdk
$a_t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={68}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3d1dfe70cdc0d574aa6cf3e228a57166]%mdk
$r_t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={72}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[51ea1d83a184a2f1d8ae7841635411b3]%mdk
$q_\astar(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5fef0cad4aba3db3f3fbea4b0f454828]%mdk
$Q_t(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={93}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d20ba9d73a17e6cab8c07c651787f6d5]%mdk
$K_a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[412b625806b1734b05e3dbb3a5847a39]%mdk
$R_1, \dots, R_{K_a}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={97}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[80162bc506c2fd967c2eb373f8badeaa]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={98}
Q_t(a) = \frac{R_1 + \dots + R_{K_a}}{K_a}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={101}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[12e7e5cf646c3ad6a579245371ce7af8]%mdk
$K_a \to \infty$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={101}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[51ea1d83a184a2f1d8ae7841635411b3]%mdk
$q_\astar(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[32b6147decdf74a741afb7d79e73f0df]%mdk
$A_t^\astar$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={108}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[72e7426e3ff6580604ed07f2c93d8a43]%mdk
$\curly{ Q_t(a_1), \dots, Q_t(a_n) }$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={110}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d8de3188336492c4de19ea0a46024e0b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={111}
A_t^\astar = \argmax_a Q_t(a)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={116}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={116}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[43c98a64bcde4857b095743482e04281]%mdk
$t+1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={118}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={126}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={128}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e358efa489f58062f10dd7316b65649e]%mdk
$t$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={128}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={128}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8b15fb53f373c2786fb9236049325267]%mdk
$\prob{A_t^\astar = a}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={129}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a3c579f0fb93ab4c8fa44c395e8ee6be]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={130}
\prob{A_t^\astar = a} = \begin{cases} 1 - \epsilon &\text{ if } a = \argmax_a{ Q_t(a)}\\[10pt]
 \displaystyle\frac{\epsilon}{n} &\text{ if } a \neq \argmax_a {Q_t(a)}\end{cases}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={140}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a4d5dd81b9e065f278c25f96fe6dd6e0]%mdk
$\forall a \ K_a \to \infty$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={140}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5fef0cad4aba3db3f3fbea4b0f454828]%mdk
$Q_t(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={140}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[51ea1d83a184a2f1d8ae7841635411b3]%mdk
$q_\astar(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={142}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a4d5dd81b9e065f278c25f96fe6dd6e0]%mdk
$\forall a \ K_a \to \infty$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={142}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[39eb128cbb659e434ad0f0284ea30ec0]%mdk
$1-\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={150}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={150}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={152}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a6f317b268ae825d94f832f970af607c]%mdk
$\tau$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={154}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[21999630a84f2b9cd06fa653f8e2dc7c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={155}
\prob{A_t^\astar = a} = \frac{e^{Q_t(a) / \tau}}{\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^n e^{Q_t(a_i) / \tau}}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={158}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b9ece18c950afbfa6b0fdbfa4ff731d3]%mdk
$T$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={158}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3a3ea00cfc35332cedf6e5e9a32e94da]%mdk
$E$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={158}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[233362635f517b005d587158c6988008]%mdk
$p_\nu \sim e^{-\frac{E_\nu}{T}}.$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={158}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={163}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={165}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk
$\epsilon$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={179}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[947e7d7d2f60f303b24b3419503e1ed7]%mdk
$\curly{R_1, \dots}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[246c34c550a7977ad4c582df9b57f0b6]%mdk
$Q_k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f2f5a286e58badf8f6e65cd86de754a2]%mdk
$R_k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a31a860e7a59c7616c1515ec3ae652a6]%mdk
$k+1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cc295e2b6620ca7ced9407bf409132cb]%mdk
$Q_{k+1}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={190}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8e256cc3ed9e2c678df5497d27d9e2fe]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={191}
\begin{aligned}
Q_{k+1} &= \frac{1}{k} \sum_i^k R_i\\
&=  \frac{1}{k} \paren{R_k +\sum_{i=1}^{\textcolor{red}{k-1}} R_i}\\
&=  \frac{1}{k} \paren{R_k +\textcolor{red}{(k-1) Q_k}}\\
&=  Q_k + \frac{1}{k} \paren{R_k - Q_k}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={203}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[246c34c550a7977ad4c582df9b57f0b6]%mdk
$Q_k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={203}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={207}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[bd65684fa6047f03562a0c4e748fa1fa]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={208}
NewEstimate  =  OldEstimate + StepSize \sqbra{Target - OldEstimate}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={213}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7e09b4bf9bcbff3a064c1e8f8ffc8abf]%mdk
$Target - OldEstimate$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={213}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c41a31890959544c6523af684561abe5]%mdk
$Target$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c41a31890959544c6523af684561abe5]%mdk
$Target$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c41a31890959544c6523af684561abe5]%mdk
$Target$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={216}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[975ca8804565c1a569450d61090b2743]%mdk
$1/2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={218}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[071449462d0c247e47313eb8c3129dd0]%mdk
$StepSize$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={218}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7f7486d5fcba38183b0e5b2b7842e9bf]%mdk
$\alpha_t(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={218}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661]%mdk
$a$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={232}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[691075217eb13799c1fc2c5ae2f3b215]%mdk
$\frac{1}{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={232}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bf806ccfe8e86b4695f81d1af3ee046b]%mdk
$0 <\alpha \leq 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={234}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1056b49c389f329aa66490ea407de5f2]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={235}
Q_{k+1} = Q_k + \textcolor{red}{\alpha} \sqbra{R_k - Q_k} \quad \paren{k=1, \dots }
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={239}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f09564c9ca56850d4cd6b3319e541aee]%mdk
$Q$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={241}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[29316d394441738a51a5dde57c62d58e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={242}
\begin{aligned}
Q_{k+1} &= Q_k + \alpha \sqbra{R_k - Q_k} \quad \paren{k=1, \dots }\\
&= (1-\alpha)Q_k + \alpha R_k\\
&= (1-\alpha)\textcolor{red}{\paren{\paren{1-\alpha}Q_{k-1} + \alpha R_{k-1}} }+ \alpha R_k\\
&= (1-\alpha)^2 Q_{k-1} + \paren{1-\alpha}\alpha R_{k-1} + \alpha R_k\\
&= \dots\\
&= (1-\alpha)^{k-1} Q_{1} +  \sum_{i=0}^{k-1}\paren{1-\alpha}^i \alpha R_{k-i}\\
&= (1-\alpha)^{k-1} Q_{1} +  \sum_{i=1}^{k}\paren{1-\alpha}^{k-i} \alpha R_{i}.
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={258}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e61c6b2966d98db18cb5a378d991eb5d]%mdk
$\displaystyle\sum_{i=0}^{k-1}\paren{1-\alpha}^i = \frac{1 - \paren{1-\alpha}^k}{1 - \paren{1-\alpha} } = \frac{1- \paren{1-\alpha}^k}{/\alpha}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={261}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1a43913bee1eb714983a7283b1ed20c5]%mdk
$Q_1, R_1, \dots, R_k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={262}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7080414a6c853398713420945d15c0c0]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={263}
\paren{1-\alpha}^k + \sum_{i=1}^{k}\paren{1-\alpha}^{k-i} = 1
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={267}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f051a80df7b0b0387853ab14b2dadd4]%mdk
$\alpha = \text{const.}とした処方は，「$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={267}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a51a5bf0cf823fca6fac57e4473eddd1]%mdk
$番目のrewardを$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={273}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[071449462d0c247e47313eb8c3129dd0]%mdk
$StepSize$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={273}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8a9df5a470f0ff7701b1ddfb813f9a74]%mdk
$\alpha = \frac{1}{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={273}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5fef0cad4aba3db3f3fbea4b0f454828]%mdk
$Q_t(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={273}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[51ea1d83a184a2f1d8ae7841635411b3]%mdk
$q_\astar(a)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={275}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[071449462d0c247e47313eb8c3129dd0]%mdk
$StepSize$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={275}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bbbff5056a47f21dd016cf0cf2e02154]%mdk
$\alpha_t{a}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={277}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[21dcf4764218a084aa1d964ec5e477a0]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={278}
\sum_k^\infty \alpha_k = \infty, \quad \sum_k^\infty \alpha^2_k < \infty.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={281}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8a9df5a470f0ff7701b1ddfb813f9a74]%mdk
$\alpha = \frac{1}{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={281}
